location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

physicalDescription.extent: Material: printed on paper.Dimensions: 300 x 350 mm.

mods.abstract: Relief map found at folio 64 of 'Reconnaissances in Mesopotamia, Kurdistan, North-West Persia and Luristan, Volume I', by F R Maunsell.The map shows Rawanduz and the surrounding territory, including the Rhubar Gorge, and is bounded on the east by the Beni Hindawin range. The map shows hydrology, buildings, military camps, and a vineyard.
